Metadata.title: IAESTE Lleida | International Internships
Metadata.description: Non-profit organization of the Polytechnic School of the University of Lleida.
Metadata.keywords: international internships, global internships, technical internships, cultural exchange, IAESTE Lleida
Metadata.ogDescription: Exchanging students for technical work experience in 100+ countries around the world.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Exchanging students for technical work experience in 100+ countries around the world.

hero.description: Join a global network connecting talented students with international technical internships. Experience professional growth while discovering new cultures through IAESTE's worldwide exchange program.

about.title: What is IAESTE?
about.subtitle: Bridging Spanish talent with global opportunities
about.description: As IAESTE LC Lleida, part of IAESTE Spain's national network, we facilitate paid technical internships through our non-profit platform at Escola Politècnica Superior. Since 1948, we've connected UdL students with 100+ countries through our structured exchange system.

internship.title: An internship
internship.subtitle: Local to global
internship.description: UdL students submit profiles, and IAESTE LC Lleida works with IAESTE Spain to match skills with global opportunities.

auction.title: Auction
auction.subtitle: Dual placement system
auction.description: For every student from Lleida, we welcome an international intern, ensuring balance through national coordination.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.subtitle: End-to-end assistance
exchange.description: IAESTE LC Lleida handles visas and housing, ensuring smooth transitions for students going abroad and coming to Catalonia.

Metadata.title: IAESTE Lleida | UDL Internships for International Students
Metadata.description: Discover remunerated international internships at UdL with IAESTE Lleida. Boost your career with global experiences and cultural exchange.
Metadata.keywords: udl internships, international internships, udl students, cultural exchange, professional growth
Metadata.ogTitle: IAESTE Lleida - UDL Internships for International Students
Metadata.ogDescription: Join IAESTE Lleida and access remunerated internships at UdL that enhance your career on an international level.
Metadata.twitterTitle: IAESTE Lleida - UDL Internships for Students
Metadata.twitterDescription: Boost your career with remunerated international internships and a unique cultural exchange at IAESTE Lleida.

hero.title: Join IAESTE Lleida
hero.subtitle: Shape your international career
hero.description: Take the first step towards an enriching international experience. Join IAESTE Lleida to access global opportunities and develop both professionally and personally.

why-iaeste.title: Why IAESTE?
why-iaeste.subtitle: Structured global mobility
why-iaeste.description: Join IAESTE LC Lleida to access exclusive, verified international internships that enhance your career prospects. Gain valuable professional experience, expand your global network, and enjoy cultural exchange opportunities while securing academic recognition for your work in leading companies and institutions worldwide.

oportunities.title: Global opportunities
oportunities.description: Access internships in 80+ countries, build an international network, boost global career.

growth.title: Professional growth
growth.description: Develop real-world technical skills, enhance your CV, and gain professional insights.

exchange.title: Cultural exchange
exchange.description: Immerse in new cultures, build intercultural competence, and form lasting international friendships.

internship.title: Paid internships
internship.description: Earn paid internships, gaining valuable experience while covering living expenses abroad.

teams.title: Choose a team
teams.subtitle: Be part of something bigger
teams.description: Join one of our dynamic teams at IAESTE Lleida. Develop leadership skills, gain organizational experience, and make a difference while helping other students access international opportunities.

junta.name: Board
junta.description: Lead strategic initiatives and guide our organization's direction.

empreses.name: Companies
empreses.description: Build relationships with local and international employers.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Create compelling content and promote IAESTE's mission.

it.name: IT
it.description: Maintain and improve our digital infrastructure.

eventos.name: Events
eventos.description: Organize engaging activities and professional events.

contact.title: Start your IAESTE journey
contact.description: Join UdL's engineering students who've launched global careers through our LC Lleida program.

Metadata.title: IAESTE Lleida | Information for Incoming International Students
Metadata.description: All the essential information you need to prepare your arrival in Lleida. Support, requirements, and advice for incoming international students with IAESTE.
Metadata.keywords: incoming international students, incoming lleida, student information, cultural exchange, international student support
Metadata.ogTitle: IAESTE Lleida - Welcome Incoming International Students
Metadata.ogDescription: Prepare your exchange experience in Lleida with all the information and support provided by IAESTE for incoming international students.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Discover the details and support you need for your arrival in Lleida with IAESTE.

Metadata.title: IAESTE Lleida | Companies & International Talent
Metadata.description: Collaborate with IAESTE Lleida to host skilled international students. Access remunerated internships that bring fresh ideas and global perspectives to your company.
Metadata.keywords: iaeste company, international talent, paid internships, technical internships, global collaboration
Metadata.ogDescription: Partner with IAESTE Lleida to connect with motivated technical students from across the globe, driving innovation and diversity in your workplace.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Discover how partnering with IAESTE gives your company access to international technical students through remunerated internships.

hero.title: Partner with IAESTE Lleida
hero.subtitle: Bring international expertise to your team
hero.description: Join IAESTE’s global exchange program and access talented students from 100+ countries. Host remunerated internships that enrich your company with innovation, cultural diversity, and professional excellence.

why.title: Why collaborate with IAESTE?
why.subtitle: International talent made simple
why.description: By hosting IAESTE interns, your company gains access to motivated students trained in technical fields. The structured exchange system ensures quality, reliability, and support at every stage.

talent.title: Global talent
talent.description: Access a pool of skilled students from leading universities worldwide.

innovation.title: Innovation & diversity
innovation.description: Gain fresh perspectives and creative solutions through cultural exchange.

growth.title: Business growth
growth.description: Expand your company’s reach while contributing to international mobility.

contact.title: Start collaborating with us
contact.description: Get in touch with IAESTE Lleida and discover how hosting an international intern can add value to your company.

jaume.quote: IAESTE opened doors I never knew existed.
jaume.title: Engineering innovation in Germany
jaume.description: During my internship at a leading automotive company in Munich, I gained hands-on experience with cutting-edge technologies while developing my professional network. The experience enhanced both my technical skills and cultural understanding.

jordi.quote: The perfect blend of professional and personal growth.
jordi.title: Research excellence
jordi.description: Working at the Technical University of Berlin allowed me to contribute to groundbreaking research while experiencing life in one of Europe's most dynamic cities. IAESTE made the entire process smooth and supported me throughout.

pepito.quote: An experience that shaped my career path.
pepito.title: Industrial innovation
pepito.description: My internship at a German manufacturing plant gave me practical insights into Industry 4.0 technologies. The international environment and professional challenges helped me grow both technically and personally.

pep.quote: More than just an internship - a life-changing experience.
pep.title: Technology leadership
pep.description: Participating in a software development project at a leading tech company in Hamburg taught me valuable lessons in international collaboration and professional communication while advancing my technical expertise.
